description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) used the `China Chopper` web shell as a persistence mechanism on compromised Microsoft Exchange servers.(Citation: apt41_dcsocytec_dec2022)(Citation: FireEye APT41 Aug 2019)
